name: Panda Bungee Run
description:
Jump and fall, tomy is a brave panda.
She is jump to the get coins and babies.

This game is wholly filled with adventure and fun. Your character here is cute panda. Amazing intrepid game for you to play. Fall from the top building.
The game is developed for all adventure geeks.

How to play:
- Tap the right side of screen to move right, or tap the left side to the left direction
- Do not touch the obstacle
- Tap the panda when she fall into the red area, so that she can open parachute
- Land on the target platform to complete level.
